name: Cirque du Soleil
description: Enter the world of Cirque du Soleil for an up close and intimate look at their most provocative shows. Cirque du Soleil VR brings these stunning experiences to life like never before.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
